column4: any suggestions for what i should use to get ubuntu on an eeepc? there seems to be a wide variety of options, from stock ubuntu + array.org kernel, or "easypeasy", or Ubuntu Netbook Remix (but does this support all the eeepc 901 hardware out of the box?)
I'm actually installing ubuntu on an eeepc right now
I've used USB before but using TFTP for a net install
i'm fine with using USB or netinstall, i'm mostly interested in *which* flavor i should choose, since stock doesn't seem to work with all the hardware and there are 3 or 4 ways of going about it
